block.p: Elizabeth Susanne Hall, the daughter of Suzan C. Hall and Charles B. Hall, both of Portland, Ore., was married yesterday to Peter Beck Thauer, the son of Nancy Thauer and Peter E. Thauer of Saddle River, N.J. The Rev. Dr. Edwin H. Cromey performed the ceremony at St. Mary's-in-Tuxedo Episcopal Church in Tuxedo Park, N.Y.

Mrs. Thauer, 31, is a senior project manager for office design and construction at Morgan Stanley Dean Witter, the New York brokerage firm, and a member of the New York Junior League. She graduated from Smith College. Her mother is a freelance writer and editor. Her father is a marketing consultant.

Elizabeth Susanne Hall, the daughter of Suzan C. Hall and Charles B. Hall, both of Portland, Ore., was married yesterday to Peter Beck Thauer, the son of Nancy Thauer and Peter E. Thauer of Saddle River, N.J. The Rev. Dr. Edwin H. Cromey performed the ceremony at St. Mary's-in-Tuxedo Episcopal Church in Tuxedo Park, N.Y.

Mrs. Thauer, 31, is a senior project manager for office design and construction at Morgan Stanley Dean Witter, the New York brokerage firm, and a member of the New York Junior League. She graduated from Smith College. Her mother is a freelance writer and editor. Her father is a marketing consultant.

Mr. Thauer, 32, is a vice president for corporate finance at Chase Securities in New York. He graduated from Cornell and received an M.B.A. from Columbia. His father is the general counsel at the Cambrex Corporation, a biotechnology and chemicals company in East Rutherford, N.J.
